title: Non-aural set, piano trio - seventh chord quality

content.prompt: The quality of the seventh chord in measure 13 is

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements
